item.description:
Call it brunch al fresco!

Instead of our regular fourth Sunday brunch, we're going to join the campers at Tolland State Forest in Massachusetts for a picnic in the park's day use area. Please bring an item to share for this potluck event. Weather permitting, plan on water activities, inlcuding, we hope, a boat.

The campers have to check out of their campsites by 11:00 AM, so that would be a good time to arrive.

Directions can be found at park's web site

RSVP via the site or to Gloria before Friday, as she will be with the camping party!
item.name: Picnic
